background.story: A powerful angel who defends the haven of angels. Even among the Angels who wield the power of light, she has a special connection to the sun, whose devine light she uses to fight against darkness. She is tasked with the protection of the soul of the other angels awaiting resurrection. When the Holy Sword reappeared in the world, she heeded the divine call to join to join the new protector of the world. She will see to it that no chosen warrior would ever succumb to the darkness again.
profile: She likes her fellow kinsmen, and enforcing order.
She is a knight of the righteous heavens and she punishes evil with her sword and protects the weak with her shield.
She descended in order to defeat the Demons who are ruining the earthly realm.
She is the second angel to be released, after Arch.
Likely the chosen warrior in her story is Kyle, who seems to have fallen into path of darkness.
